handle_api_delay.prompt: The API team says they may need an extra week. What do you do?

push_launch.text: Push the team to launch on the original date and fix issues after release.
push_launch.feedback: You maintained momentum, but unresolved dependencies increased delivery risk and weakened stakeholder confidence.

negotiate_delay.text: Negotiate a short delay and align stakeholders on a revised plan.
negotiate_delay.feedback: You balanced delivery realism with communication, reducing risk and strengthening stakeholder trust.

escalate_issue.text: Escalate the issue to leadership for direction.
escalate_issue.feedback: Escalation brought clarity, but limited your ownership of the decision.
